name: The Story of Melody
description:
The tale of a young forest girl living in the wilds of the ancient world, Encanta. Melody will embark on an epic quest to find eight magical notes to create a song to bring peace. Boasting a large overworld, dangerous dungeons and many secrets in the hidden nooks of the world. The Story of Melody promises high adventure with monsters, weapons, magic and exploration. Stay tuned for more news!

If you play the demo, we'd love to hear your feedback. You can leave it in the comments or take our feedback survey on the Glacier Games website!!

http://glacier-games.weebly.com/survey.html

Thanks!
